title: REVIEW BY THE ENVIRONMENTAL BOARD
content:
(A)

This section applies to an application for a variance from the requirements of Chapter 30-5, Subchapter A (Water Quality).

(B)

The environmental commission shall consider an application for a variance and forward
its recommendation to the land use commission.

(C)

The land use commission shall consider the environmental commission's recommendation
before acting on a variance.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-213; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42; Ord. No. 20230831-142, Pt. 12, 9-1-23.

The single office shall give notice under Section 30-1-153(A) (Notice of Public Hearing) of a public hearing on an application for a variance required to be heard by the
land use commission.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-214; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
